beroux.mountnfall
Class InGameBackground

java.lang.Object
  beroux.mountnfall.Pattern
      beroux.mountnfall.InGameBackground
class InGameBackground
extends Pattern

An accelerated version of Background. Doesn't render the background behind the game's board.

create

public boolean create(Sprite pattern)
Change the pattern of the "white" squares.

Parameters:
pattern - The image that will be repeated to form background.

translate

public void translate(float dx,
                      float dy)
Translate the background. If you call twice this function, the translation's length will be doubled.

Parameters:
dx - Translation over X.
dy - Translation over Y.
